That came in response to her telling the male, identified to Page Six as Sharpe, “Don’t manipulate me.”

3 Shannon Sharpe is being sued by a woman accusing him of rape. The texts released to the media Tuesday have not been independently verified, but claim it highlights the “pattern of sexual role-playing that specifically includes her being choked by him.”

In one message alleged to be from the woman suing Sharpe, the 56-year-old’s representatives pointed to the Oct. 9, 2023, interaction as one example of the nature of their relationship. It is the second such clip that has been released claiming to show Sharpe — who has offered multiple denials over the allegations made toward him — threatening to “choke” the woman. The clip begins with the woman asking if a man identified by Doe’s legal team as Sharpe is “coming to LA tomorrow,” which he confirmed to her in response. In an audio clip obtained by Page Six on Tuesday, Sharpe allegedly told the woman, “Lord, have mercy.
